name: hudx
description: Unified HudX package including core and charts

scripts.build: vite build && sed -i '' "s|../../core/src/index.ts|HudX/core|g" dist/packages/hudx/src/index.d.ts && sed -i '' "s|../../charts/src/index.ts|HudX/charts|g" dist/packages/hudx/src/index.d.ts && mv dist/packages/hudx/src/index.d.ts dist/index.d.ts && rm -rf dist/packages
